question.qtext: It\'s good to see you made it. Please take a seat and make yourself comfortable. Do you want some coffee? Yes? Ok then. I want to ask you some questions to your personal backround. What is your name?

choice.story: That's a nice name.

question.qtext: What kind of qualification do you have?

choice.story: I'm positive surprised to hear this. That's generally an advantage in our business area.
That's a solid qualification. We have many job-opportunities for you.
This lets me think that you're a pratical type of person. The Nerdy Computer Systems Corporation likes this.

choice.ctext: Went to university but did not finish.
choice.story: Generally, this is no problem. We have job-opportunities for university dropouts as well.
This is really interesting. The Nerdy Computer Systems Corporation likes self-reliantness.
Hm. So you might feel comfortable with a PC-workplace.
Good. Business know-how is very important in our company.
Ok. Endurance and willpower can be key success factor in the business world.
Excellent. Technically skilled people is just what we need.
Oh. So i will check if the Public Relations Department has vacant positions.

question.qtext: What did you do at the side?

choice.ctext: I competed at local sportevents and made a lot of friends.
choice.story: This is a good way to learn how to relate to people and gain confidence.

choice.ctext: I wrote software for a multinational company.
choice.story: This is impressive and shows that you dont waste your time.
This is a remarkable talent. Maybe we have something for you on the bridge.

choice.ctext: I organized events for the students commitee.
choice.story: Good. Organizing is a complex task an not easy to learn.

choice.ctext: Made alot of friends through social-networking.
choice.story: Good thing. Maintaining relationships is exact what the PR-Department does.

question.qtext: What was the most important thing to you during this time?

choice.story: This reinforces your strong backround.
One never stops learning.
I feel sorry for you.
Ok, i see.
(Brofist.)

question.qtext: Christmas time has arrived. NCS Staff is preparing for a big X-Mas-Event. A colleague proposes to add a “little extra” to the bowl at tonight´s event. He gives you a bottle Single Malt Whisky. Do you...

choice.ctext: Take the bottle and inform your supervisor.
choice.story: Your colleague gets a written warning and doesn´t talk to you anymore. Your supervisor ist pleased. You sit alone at your table during the evening.

choice.ctext: Take the bottle and “improve” the punch bowl....
choice.story: The party gets a little out of hand. Everybody´s having a great time. Your colleague thinks you´re a cool guy. On the next morning, you can´t remember much, but you see the pictures on facebook.
Your colleague thinks you´re a boring person. So is tonight´s event..
